channel.title: Guitar Player's Club
channel.description:
I can't see any guitar player's clubs anywhere on here So I thought I make own one.
I own a Fender Stratocaster (Mexican) with HSS Config, Squire Strat Affinity Series which Im going to paint soon (The EVH Black & White Frankenstrat is what im painting on it), Samick P-Bass
Anyone want to join? Just post here with what number you want.
slashrox #1 XxKanexX #2 Omfgurweird #4 googlethis #5 killer kure #666 sppt #3 billskie #97? (Can You Confirm this Please?) pko #69 exps35 #22 Pyro #13 SomethingToHide #72 R.I.P RSC #106 Slayerexpert #1337 ScotaloticaS - (#69 is already taken, choose another number)

item.title: Guitar Player's Club
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Ok youre in Smiley What model schecter you have?
[quote="exps35, post:18, topic:17256"]shweet ill join.

I have a fender starcaster (exact spelling, cheap-assed first guitar ;D)

and I also have a Schecter C-1 diamond series. my friend and I took out all the shitty taiwaneese wiring inside and put in american ones. I had Invaders in there too, but that limited me too much to one sound (which was a7x). So my friend put in some other duncans (not sure which ones) but now I have this sweet tone and it sounds awesome Im currently saving up to get a floyd rose put in there, because I feel kinda empty without a wammy bar[/quote]

i said earlyer

OMFG thanks for asking that though, because i was going to show you a picture of one that is close to what i have, because i could never find a picture of a full black one. I always searched schecter c1 diamond series in google, but i just tried schecter c1 artist and finally found some pictures of it

It has a white marble trim around the edges

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Player's Club
item.dc:creator: @slashrox slashrox
item.description:
@slashrox wrote:

exps35:

ill go with number 22 I guess.

Ok youre in What model schecter you have?

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:23, topic:17256”]I’ll be #72

I play a Les Paul. &Sometimes my glass warlock.
On a GMX212 Behringer. 120W.[/quote]

Les Paul’s are awesome guitars, Im looking at getting a Epi LP ZW Bullseye or a Kramer JS (or baretta) next year, If the LP had a Floyd Rose Bridge, no need to get the Kramer

R.I.P RSC:

ill be #106 i play some cheap ass guitar but i have 2 of them

Strat copy im guessing? Oh well if it plays, its better than nothing

[quote=“Slayerexpert, post:25, topic:17256”]I’ll be #1337

Check out my srexy Epiphone Les Paul Ultra, it has chambers in the body that make it 10 pounds lighter =)

Oh yeah, my amp is a Vox AD30VT, pretty good amp, 98% transistor, but has a final stage tube in it which makes it sound pretty swoot. The amp goes through a FX 86B Death Metal Distortion pedal.

BTW, slashrox, is that toenail polish you’re wearing in that last pic =X[/quote]

Awesome guitar, I haven’t tried a Vox amp yet, will soon

And no Im not wearing Nail Polish on my toenail

ScotaloticaS:

Ill join ill be #69

#69 has already been taken, please choose another number.

Original post of this thread has been updated.

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Player's Club
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

ill go with number 22 I guess.

and no, were not made of money. Im dirt poor and i got my schecter used and for fairly cheap from my guitar teacher. he felt bad for me and said I deserved a better guitar.
And i bought a vintage MXR distortion+ with the money I saved. I love it the older ones without the red light sound alot better, and it sounds more like Rhandy Roads. The new ones sound too much like wylde.

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Player's Club
item.dc:creator: @slashrox slashrox
item.description:
@slashrox wrote:

[quote=“Pyro, post:19, topic:17256”]Ive got #13

Seriously. Are you guys amde of money. I own a samic chinese guitar thing. Samic dont name there cheap guitars they just give em stuff like fg - 3453. And i own a washburn bass bantam series pro. Was cheap as chips. I play through a practice amp and then use other peoples gear if i want to get louder[/quote]

Samicks arent too bad, Ive got a Samick P-Bass and its the best bass Ive played so Far

I wish I was made of money Ive gotta save up $1700 for a Marshall DSL50 Head then an extra $700 for a 2x12 Cab.

XxKanexX:

My Brother (slash) took my amp that came with my Acoustic-Electric… eye twitches We have 2 amps but apparently ‘Mines better’.

It is better than Mine. The great sound I once had in my 20w amp isnt there anymore thanks to me plugging my bass (samick bass) in. I was told that I could do that (when I started Playing Guitar & Bass)

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 10:44:17 PM[/size][hr]Here are my Guitars

Fender Strat

Picture193.jpg800×604

Samick P Bass

samickbass.jpg800×600

Squire Strat (My first Guitar That Im going to paint EVH B&W Soon)

Picture095.jpg800×604

Read full topic

I have a fender starcaster (exact spelling, cheap-assed first guitar ;D)

and I also have a Schecter C-1 diamond series. my friend and I took out all the shitty taiwaneese wiring inside and put in american ones. item.title: Guitar Player's Club
item.dc:creator: @Oh_chappy Oh chappy
item.description:
@Oh_chappy wrote:

[quote=“slashrox, post:13, topic:17256”]sorry I haven’t replied in a long time guys.

I will post pix of my guitar soon.

I play an Ibanez, Fender Picks and Strings, Johnson Amp and Eric Clapton Guitar case

Digital Pedal with 99 effects my personal being wow and grunge.

What Kind of Ibanez do you use? I used to have a RG27SP (for 2 weeks), got rid of it because the bridge (which was a LO-TRS2) was a pain in the ass and wouldnt stay in tune

a few people on other forums i go on were saying the LO-TRS2 Locking Trem isnt very stable, so If i want a guitar with a Locking trem, Ill make sure next time its got a Original Floyd Rose Bridge on there.[/quote]

dude that’s awsome!

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Player's Club
item.dc:creator: @slashrox slashrox
item.description:
@slashrox wrote:

sorry I haven’t replied in a long time guys.

I will post pix of my guitar soon.

[quote=“VG_Kobra, post:12, topic:17256”]I play an Ibanez, Fender Picks and Strings, Johnson Amp and Eric Clapton Guitar case

Digital Pedal with 99 effects my personal being wow and grunge.[/quote]

What Kind of Ibanez do you use? I used to have a RG27SP (for 2 weeks), got rid of it because the bridge (which was a LO-TRS2) was a pain in the ass and wouldnt stay in tune

a few people on other forums i go on were saying the LO-TRS2 Locking Trem isnt very stable, so If i want a guitar with a Locking trem, Ill make sure next time its got a Original Floyd Rose Bridge on there.

Read full topic
